mapper.sql: PID, PNAME, PCOMS, PPEOPLE, PTYPE, PDEPT, PSOURCE, POTHERS, PDATE, PSTARTTIME, PENDTIME
mapper.insert: insert into K_PROJECT (PID, PNAME, PCOMS, PPEOPLE, PTYPE, PDEPT, PSOURCE, POTHERS, PDATE, PSTARTTIME, PENDTIME) values (#{pid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcoms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ppeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ptype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{psource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pothers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pstarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update K_PROJECT
PNAME = #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PCOMS = #{pcoms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PPEOPLE = #{ppeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PTYPE = #{ptype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PDEPT = #{pdept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PSOURCE = #{psource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POTHERS = #{pothers,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PDATE = #{pdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PSTARTTIME = #{pstarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PENDTIME = #{pendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where PID = #{pid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update K_PROJECT set PNAME = #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PCOMS = #{pcoms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PPEOPLE = #{ppeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PTYPE = #{ptype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PDEPT = #{pdept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PSOURCE = #{psource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POTHERS = #{pothers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PDATE = #{pdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PSTARTTIME = #{pstarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PENDTIME = #{pendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where PID = #{pid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
